channel.title: How to change the icon of a folder
channel.description:
I know half of you people will say i already knew this but its good for the newbies. I just played around with some stuff today and found out this. This tutorial is guaranteed no errors. Do not post if you don't have anything nice to say.
Title:How to change your folder icon
Purpose: To change your folder icon
Difficulty: 1
First right click and select properties.
[img]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm105/cookingthero/1-1.jpg[/img]
Then select customise.
[img]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm105/cookingthero/2-1.jpg[/img]
If you want to choose your own picture select choose picture if you want a default one then select change icon. In this one we will be selecting change icon.
[img]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm105/cookingthero/2-1.jpg[/img]
Then you will get this screen
[img]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm105/cookingthero/4-1.jpg[/img]
Then choose the icon you want in this one i will be selecting the star.
[img]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm105/cookingthero/5-1.jpg[/img]
Then select apply and your done!
[img]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm105/cookingthero/6-1.jpg[/img]
Video for proof.
[url=http://"http://s294.photobucket.com/albums/mm105/cookingthero/?action=view&current=clip0290.flv"][img]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm105/cookingthero/th_clip0290.jpg[/img][/url]
Credits: 100% me
Good comments:
1.
2.
3.
4.

item.title: How to change the icon of a folder
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

I know half of you people will say i already knew this but its good for the newbies. I just played around with some stuff today and found out this. This tutorial is guaranteed no errors. Do not post if you don’t have anything nice to say.

Title:How to change your folder icon

Purpose: To change your folder icon

Difficulty: 1

First right click and select properties.

Then select customise.

If you want to choose your own picture select choose picture if you want a default one then select change icon. In this one we will be selecting change icon.

Then you will get this screen

Then choose the icon you want in this one i will be selecting the star.

Then select apply and your done!

Video for proof.

Credits:
100% me
